com.att.m2x.android.main

Class M2XAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.m2x.android.main.M2XAPI

  • public class M2XAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    View the M2X Android Client README for usage details.

    Authentication: All methods described in this page require that a Master API Key is specified in the X-M2X-KEY header. Any attempt of using a Distribution or Device level API key would result in a 403 Forbidden response. Learn more about API Keys.
